skill.refm.deadlybackflip.tooltip:
Rush in to your enemy kicking him to do a backflip.
After the backflip rush into your enemy a second time to give him a lethal stab
skill.refm.deadlybackflip_ender.tooltip:
Rush in to your enemy kicking him to go into a end portal.
After entering the portal you will use the end lost energy to shatter your enemy in pieces
